COPETE: 14r. Chairman: an excellent report has been made by the Finaneial Policy

It is clear that local .currency loans can only be granted under exceptional

but such exceptional circumstances must be subject to careful study in

I would like to know why in the fourth paragraph such strong words as

BASIN: In connection with J4r. JlcFarlane's first point, I would like to ask

KcFA.RLANEz I am afraid I did not get the question. BASYNz It' a country borrows dollars to illport goods from the U.S., the counter-
